answers.answer: "...could this be nerve damage from my diabetes"It is possible. How are you managing your glucose levels? Have you seen a doctor? We cannot see or diagnose you over the Internet.

question: I have been itching on my back just in the upper back right side, have a sensation of numbness and crawling, I am a diabetic and do have a lung disease, asthma and chronic bronchitis, could this be nerve damage from my diabetes
title: Bothersome itching
